Name: Esquire #2
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Spirit (vodka) forward and floral with notes of berry fruit.
History: Created in the 1990s by Dick Bradsell for Esquire Magazine.
Nutrition: One serving of Esquire #2 contains 181 calories
